amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for administrative expenses for the Federal Transit Administration by $1,287,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the funds for administrative expenses for the Federal Transit Administration by $1,287,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 215 (Roll no. 422).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 215 (Roll no. 422).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
